sentences.sContent: And now they draw cartoons about you.
sentences.sCn: 而现在，他们却画漫画来讽刺你。

sentences.sContent: Walt wanted to draw cartoons like those he saw in the newspapers, but he had little free time.
sentences.sContent_eng: Walt wanted to draw cartoons like those he saw in the newspapers, but he had little free time.
sentences.sCn: 沃尔特想画一些像他在报纸上看到的那样的卡通画，但他没有空闲时间。
